txt.en: Pleased with your assistance protecting their herds, the oxherds of the Uch-lûth have agreed to trade provisions to the Grey Company.

'We cannot deny that your help has secured the health and safety of our people. We will then grant you your wish: we will trade meat to the other duvodiad.\n\n'Take this first package to your friends with our gratitude.'
Andreg is at Echad Saeradan in the Windfells of Enedwaith, north-west of Uch Cadlus.\n\nWunne has asked you to deliver a package of meat to the Grey Company.
'Your friends offer your arm quite freely, do they not? Perhaps they are not so much your friends as you think.\n\n'Nevertheless, I will not refuse a strong arm to protect our herds.'
Wunne is at Uch Cadlus in the Windfells, south-east of Echad Saeradan.\n\nAndreg instructed you to return to Wunne and offer her your services should she need them again.
'Return to Wunne and offer her your services.'

'You turned the hearts of the oxherds? Then I am in your debt, [placeholder]. These provisions will be a boon to us.\n\n'Return to Mistress Wunne and offer her your services should she need them again...we have little else to trade.'
'You will take that meat to your wandering friends, yes?'
'Were you unable to sway the Uch-lûth?'
'You have proven your intentions and those of your wandering friends. Perhaps we were hasty in our judgement of you.'
Bring the ox-meat to Andreg at Echad Saeradan
'You have helped to protect our herds from the wolves and the Cun Annun which howl at night! You are surely a friend to the Uch-lûth.'
Talk to Wunne at Uch Cadlus
